text:
it would be very nice if ant made a trim for every property value that it reads
from a property file (<property> task). Currently also trailing spaces are read,
this can cost time to find out where the error/typo is...

steps to reproduce:

jars.ant:

property_name1=property_value1[trailing_space]

build.xml:

<property file="ant/jars.ant"/>

if you query the property ${property_name1} values, it will have a trailing space...

Thanks!
creator: alex1979_18@yahoo.com

text:
I'm sure that there are people out there who really want trailing spaces in
their properties.

Use <loadproperties> together with a filter that trims your lines (I don't think
there is one, but you can roll your own and use <filterreader>).
creator: bodewig@apache.org
